definition: to face upwards/to look up to the sky
to face upward/to look up/to admire/to rely on

sentences.english: Facing the death, he has a good laugh, this is the what kind dauntless spirit.
sentences.chinese: 面对死亡，他仰天大笑，这是何等的大无畏精神。

sentences.english: The smaller crab is lying on his back.
Be careful or you'll fall on your backside.
sentences.chinese: 小心点，不然你会仰天摔一跤。

sentences.english: Xing intoxicated sky song, the song chat send a statement.
sentences.chinese: 兴酣仰天歌，歌中聊寄言。

sentences.english: Heaven Hill 46 kilometers southwest of the Qingzhou Cheng, peak elevation of 834 meters.
sentences.chinese: 仰天山在青州城西南46公里处，主峰海拔834米。

sentences.english: After reading the letter, Mr. GuanBo chat mt. huandshan cachinnation, laughter 1 minute.
sentences.chinese: 读完这封信，管波聊先生仰天大笑，笑声持续一分钟。

sentences.english: Skeeter throws back her head and laughs.
Then I wandered down to the beach and sprawled out on the sand.
sentences.chinese: 然后我又漫步到海边，仰天躺在沙滩上。

sentences.english: When the horn in the village produce sounds, it howls to the sky like a wolf.
sentences.chinese: 村里的喇叭一响，它就像只狼似的仰天长啸。

sentences.english: While it is not plain sailing, but it is sufficient to going to Heaven and laugh.
sentences.chinese: 虽说不上一帆风顺，却亦足以仰天大笑。

definition: very loudly/at the top of one's voice
to howl with laughter/to laugh one's head off
to roar/to thunder/to snarl/to bluster (of wind, waves etc)/crashing waves (onom.)/to rage (of a person)
to jump up suddenly/to bound up/to rise up in one bound
(of animals, the wind etc) to make a mournful sound/whine/moan/wail
